inclusion.criterion: ureteral stone of 5-25 mm measured on plain abdomen X-ray KUB (Kidney Ureter Bladder)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Upper or middle third ureteral stricture.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients requiring bilateral surgical stone management procedure
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a non-obstructing stone in the L ureter, no evidence of urethral strictures. Urologist not concerned with leaking and will f/u with pt next week.
